remarks: Two equivalent expressions for double restricted existential uniqueness, analogous to ~ 2eu8 .  Curiously, we can put ` E! ` on either of the internal conjuncts but not both.  We can also commute ` E! x e. A E! y e. B ` using ~ 2reu7 .  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 2-Jul-2017.)
statement:
2reu8 $p |- ( E! x e. A E! y e. B ( E. x e. A ph /\ E. y e. B ph ) <-> E! x e. A E! y e. B ( E! x e. A ph /\ E. y e. B ph ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
